articles.description: Jay Soni, who is currently seen in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai as Abhinav, is getting a lot of love and appreciation from the fans. The actor is enjoying the phase and how his character has shaped up in the show. He recently joined ETimes TV for exclusive chat…
articles.content: Now, I have grown up on what all they will say, “Kuch toh log kahenge”… but I just say only one thing while doing my job, Bhagwan main Apna kaam kar raha hoon, Baaki aap dekh lena… for me my work is … [+570 chars]
